resources.string:
• Equipment: Barbel 
• Body-part: Chest 
• Target: Pectoralis Major Sternal Head 
• Synergist: Deltoid Anterior, Pectoralis Major Clavicular Head,
	 Triceps Brachii
\u2022 Repetition: 8 - 12 \n\u2022 Sets: 3 \n\u2022 Rest: 45-60 seconds between sets.
